frontmatter.title: Access Policy API
frontmatter.description: Drupal's robust architecture for role-based access control is highly effective, yet it does come with some limitations. Although several contributed modules such as Content Access, Field Permissions, Permissions by Term, or Flexible Permissions exist to address these limitations, from 10.3 we can utilize the built-in functionality of Drupal core to achieve the same outcome.
